languages.text: "Тот, кто что-нибудь здесь тронет, подарит мне много минут удовольствий агонии, пока будет умирать от здешней заразы".
"Anyone who touches anything in here guarantees me long minutes of pleasure as they die an agonising death."
languages.original_text: "Тот, кто что-нибудь здесь тронет, подарит мне много минут удовольствий агонии, пока будет умирать от здешней заразы".

traits.locale_text: "Whoever touches anything in here will give me the pleasure of many minutes of their deathly agony as this place's infection consumes them."

languages.text: «Si alguien toca algo aquí, disfrutaré de unos minutos de placer mientras observo su muerte agónica».
languages.original_text: "Anyone who touches anything in here guarantees me long minutes of pleasure as they die an agonising death."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguien toca algo aquí, disfrutaré de unos minutos de placer mientras observo su muerte agónica».

languages.text: 「ここにあるものに触れた者はすべて、苦痛に満ちた死を遂げるまでの長い数分間の間、私に喜びを与えてくれる」
languages.original_text: "Anyone who touches anything in here guarantees me long minutes of pleasure as they die an agonising death."

traits.locale_text: 「ここにあるものに触れた者はすべて、苦痛に満ちた死を遂げるまでの長い数分間の間、私に喜びを与えてくれる」

languages.text: “要是有谁了碰这里的东西，他们一定会在漫长的痛苦中毙命。这可以为我带来相当持久的愉悦。”
languages.original_text: "Anyone who touches anything in here guarantees me long minutes of pleasure as they die an agonising death."

traits.locale_text: “要是有谁了碰这里的东西，他们一定会在漫长的痛苦中毙命。这可以为我带来相当持久的愉悦。”

languages.text: "Wer hier drinnen irgendetwas berührt, garantiert mir lange Minuten des Vergnügens, während er einen grausamen Tod stirbt."
languages.original_text: "Anyone who touches anything in here guarantees me long minutes of pleasure as they die an agonising death."

traits.locale_text: "Wer hier drinnen irgendetwas berührt, garantiert mir lange Minuten des Vergnügens, während er einen grausamen Tod stirbt."

languages.text: « Le premier qui touche à quoi que ce soit dans cette pièce mourra dans d'atroces souffrances, pour mon plus grand plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "Anyone who touches anything in here guarantees me long minutes of pleasure as they die an agonising death."

traits.locale_text: « Le premier qui touche à quoi que ce soit dans cette pièce mourra dans d'atroces souffrances, pour mon plus grand plaisir. »

languages.text: "Burada bir şeylere dokunan olursa acılar içinde ölürken dakikalar boyunca bana zevk yaşatacağı muhakkak."
languages.original_text: "Anyone who touches anything in here guarantees me long minutes of pleasure as they die an agonising death."
